home.title: Your Valet Parking Solution
home.subtitle: Streamline your valet operations with powerful tools
home.footerText: Vehicle safety and customer data security are our top priorities

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run a successful valet operation
features.feature1Subtitle: Accept payments globally with support for credit cards, digital wallets, and local payment methods. Secure, fast, and reliable transactions for your valet business.
features.feature2Subtitle: Stay on top of your vehicle keys with our intuitive key tracking and management system. Never lose a key again.
features.feature3Subtitle: With our integrated team platform, share updates, vehicle status, and customer requests in a secure and user-friendly environment.
features.feature4Subtitle: Build and nurture customer relationships with our powerful CRM system designed specifically for valet operations.
features.feature5Subtitle: Simplify your valet financial operations with our easy-to-use invoicing tool. Create, send, and track invoices effortlessly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our valet management platform
faq.question1: What is included in the free trial?
faq.answer1: Our free trial gives you full access to all features of our valet platform for 14 days. You can manage unlimited vehicles, use the customer notification system, and try all premium features without any cost.
faq.question2: Can I change my plan later?
faq.answer2: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings. The changes will take effect immediately, and any cost adjustments will be prorated based on your billing cycle.
faq.answer3: No, there are no hidden fees. The price you see is the price you pay. We believe in transparent pricing with no surprises for our valet partners.
faq.question4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer4: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal. For enterprise valet operations, we also offer invoicing options.
